name: TiffIO
short_description: TiffIO is a plugin to enable TIFF images from any Qt app. The plugin is a wrapper to libtiff 3.9.4 : It enables any Qt3 or Qt4 based application to load and save any QImage to and from most TIFF formats combinations supported by libtiff.
